sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b0c6396797a4021000b4341e6253af0f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">employee_numberISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="employee_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Leave Bucket</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_calculator');
	gr.addQuery('country.name',current.location.country);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next())
		{
			if(gr.leave_assignment == 'Y')
				{
					
					var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
					var currentMonth = gdt.getMonthLocalTime() - 1;
					var monthsLeft = 12 - currentMonth;
					var perMonth = gr.leaves / 12;
					var totalLeaves = perMonth * monthsLeft;
					
					var leaveBucket = new GlideRecord('x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_bucket');
					leaveBucket.initialize();
					leaveBucket.leave_type = gr.leave_type;
					leaveBucket.accrued = totalLeaves ;
					leaveBucket.balance = totalLeaves ;
					leaveBucket.taken = 0;
					leaveBucket.employee = current.sys_id;
					leaveBucket.insert();
				}
			
			else if(gr.leave_assignment == 'M')
				{
					var perMonthM = gr.leaves / 12;
					
					var leaveBucketM = new GlideRecord('x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_bucket');
					leaveBucketM.initialize();
					leaveBucketM.leave_type = gr.leave_type;
					leaveBucketM.accrued = perMonthM;
					leaveBucketM.balance = perMonthM;
					leaveBucketM.taken = 0;
					leaveBucketM.employee = current.sys_id;
					leaveBucketM.insert();
				}
		}
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-01 07:03:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b0c6396797a4021000b4341e6253af0f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Leave Bucket</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1327151_leave_ma">3c36e9239764021000b4341e6253af08</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">3c36e9239764021000b4341e6253af08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b0c6396797a4021000b4341e6253af0f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-01 12:10:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b0c6396797a4021000b4341e6253af0f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_eaf30fb79768421000b4341e6253af73
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1327151_leave_ma.lmsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>lmsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var lmsAjax = Class.create();
lmsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDateDiff : function()
	{
	var d1 = new GlideDate();
	d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
	
	var d2 = new GlideDate();
	d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));	
		
	var duration = GlideDate.subtract(d1, d2);
		return duration.getNumericValue();
    },
	
	getLeaveBucket : function()
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_bucket');
		gr.addQuery('employee',this.getParameter('sysparm_user'));
		gr.addQuery('leave_type',this.getParameter('sysparm_leavetype'));
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				var leaveDetails = {};
				leaveDetails.accrued = '' + gr.accrued;
				leaveDetails.balance = '' + gr.balance;
				leaveDetails.taken = '' + gr.taken;
				return JSON.stringify(leaveDetails);
				
				
			}
	},


    type: 'lmsAjax'

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_request">approval=approved^status=submitted^EQ<item display_value="Approved" endquery="false" field="approval" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="approved"/><item display_value="Submitted" endquery="false" field="status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="submitted"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Leaves</name><order>100</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1327151_leave_ma_leave_bucket');
	gr.addQuery('employee',current.requested_by);
	gr.addQuery('leave_type',current.leave_type);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next())
		{
			gr.balance = gr.balance - current.duration;
			gr.taken = gr.taken + current.duration;
			gr.update();
		}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-05 14:26:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf76884197b8421000b4341e6253af4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Leaves</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1327151_leave_ma">3c36e9239764021000b4341e6253af08</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">3c36e9239764021000b4341e6253af08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bf76884197b8421000b4341e6253af4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-05 15:52:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bf76884197b8421000b4341e6253af4a"/></record_update>
